mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (ID, Name, Job_number, Password, MobilePhone, Email, IsDeleted, IsSuperAdmin, CreateUserID, CreateUserTime, IsLock, ExpirationTime, DeptID) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{issuperadmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createusertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{islock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expirationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tb_user set Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Job_number = #{jobNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MobilePhone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsDeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IsSuperAdmin = #{issuperadmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateUserID = #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateUserTime = #{createusertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IsLock = #{islock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ExpirationTime = #{expirationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DeptID = #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, Name, Job_number, Password, MobilePhone, Email, IsDeleted, IsSuperAdmin, CreateUserID, CreateUserTime, IsLock, ExpirationTime, DeptID from tb_user where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, Name, Job_number, Password, MobilePhone, Email, IsDeleted, IsSuperAdmin, CreateUserID, CreateUserTime, IsLock, ExpirationTime, DeptID from tb_user
select * from tb_user where Job_number = #{jobnumber} and Password = #{password}
